Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Hor, son of Ahmes and Aset, with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with two columns of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
